headline: FedEx Freight Spinoff And Debt Deals Recast Competition And Execution Focus
summary: FedEx (NYSE:FDX) plans to spin off its FedEx Freight business, marking a major shift in its corporate structure. The company has completed multiple fixed income offerings tied to FedEx Freight, indicating a move to reshape its capital structure. Scott Ray has been appointed COO of U.S. and Canada Surface Operations as part of wider leadership changes. FedEx is a global transportation and logistics company, and any change to its freight operations matters for how it competes across ground,...
